Name: (island name) Miles!
Award Criteria: Awarded when Nook Miles program is first unlocked

Name: Angling for Perfection!
Award Criteria: Number of total fish caught

Name: Island Ichthyologist
Award Criteria: Number of unique fish caught

Name: Island Togetherness
Award Criteria: Number of days in which you've talked to every one of your villagers

Name: You've Got the Bug
Award Criteria: Number of total bugs caught

Name: Bugs Don't Bug Me
Award Criteria: Number of unique bugs caught

Name: Have a Nice DIY!
Award Criteria: Number of DIY recipes collected

Name: DIY Tools
Award Criteria: Number of tools you've crafted

Name: DIY Furniture
Award Criteria: Number of furniture pieces you've crafted

Name: Furniture Freshener
Award Criteria: Number of times you've customized furniture at a workbench

Name: Rough-hewn
Award Criteria: Number of times you've chopped wood from trees

Name: Trashed Tools
Award Criteria: Number of tools you've broken

Name: Rock-Splitting Champ
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you get 8 ores/stones from striking a rock

Name: Bona Fide Bone Finder!
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you dig up a fossil

Name: Fossil Assessment
Award Criteria: Number of fossils you've had assessed by Blathers

Name: Greedy Weeder
Award Criteria: Number of weed clumps you've sold to the shop

Name: Flower Power
Award Criteria: Number of flower seeds you've planted (does not count digging up and replanting existing flowers)

Name: Flower Tender
Award Criteria: Number of flowers you've watered

Name: Tomorrow's Trees Today
Award Criteria: Number of tree saplings you've planted (does not count planting fruits or replanting existing trees)

Name: Pick of the Bunch
Award Criteria: Number of fruits you've sold to the shop

Name: Fruit Roots
Award Criteria: Awarded for each unique fruit tree you've planted (cherry, orange, pear, peach, apple, and coconut)

Name: Shrubbery Hububbery
Award Criteria: Number of shrub starts you've planted (replanting existing shrubs)

Name: Go Ahead. Be Shellfish!
Award Criteria: Number of seashells you've sold to the shop

Name: Clam and Collected
Award Criteria: Number of clams you've dug up

Name: Trash Fishin'
Award Criteria: Number of trash items (cans, tires, or boots) you've fished up

Name: Cast Master
Award Criteria: Number of fish you've caught in a single streak without any getting away

Name: Dream House
Award Criteria: Number of times you've expanded your home

Name: Decorated Decorator
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you get an "S" ranking from the HHA

Name: Hoard Reward
Award Criteria: Number of furniture pieces you've placed in your house

Name: Good Things in Store!
Award Criteria: Number of items you've placed in your home storage

Name: Remarkable Remodeler
Award Criteria: Number of times you've remodeled the outside appearance of your home

Name: Smile Isle
Award Criteria: Number of villager requests you've fulfilled (such as returning lost items)

Name: Reaction Ruler
Award Criteria: Number of reactions you've learned

Name: Island Shutterbug
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you take a photo using the camera app on the NookPhone (screenshot button does not count, must use the app)

Name: Edit Credit
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you edit your Passport (title, comment, or photo)

Name: NookPhone Life
Award Criteria: Awarded after the 10th time you open your NookPhone

Name: That's One Smart Phone
Award Criteria: Awarded after the 1000th time you open your NookPhone

Name: Shop to It
Award Criteria: Number of times you've ordered from the Nook Shopping catalog

Name: Growing Collection
Award Criteria: Number of unique furniture pieces you've added to your catalog

Name: Nook Miles for Miles!
Award Criteria: Number of Nook Miles+ goals you've completed

Name: First-Time Buyer
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you purchase an item from a shop

Name: Seller of Unwanted Stuff
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you sell and item to a shop

Name: Moving Fees Paid!
Award Criteria: Awarded when you pay off your initial loan using Nook Miles

Name: Bell Ringer
Award Criteria: Number of total bells you've spent in shops

Name: Miles for Stalkholders
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you purchase turnips

Name: Cornering the Stalk Market
Award Criteria: Number of total bells you've profited from selling turnips

Name: No More Loan Payments!
Award Criteria: Awarded after paying off your first house loan with bells

Name: Bulletin-Board Benefit
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you post a message on your town bulletin board

Name: Popular Pen Pal
Award Criteria: Number of letters you've sent

Name: Flea Flicker
Award Criteria: Number of times you've caught fleas off a villager

Name: Cicada Memories
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you catch a cicada shell

Name: Netting Better!
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you catch five wasps in a row without running away or getting stung

Name: Pit-y Party!
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you bury a pitfall seed

Name: Taking the Sting Out
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you get stung by a wasp

Name: Faint of Heart
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you get knocked out by a Scorpion or Tarantula

Name: Overcoming Pitfalls
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you fall into a pitfall hole

Name: Faked Out!
Award Criteria: Donated a fake piece of art

Name: Lost Treasure
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time a balloon present you shot lands in a body of water

Name: It's Raining Treasure!
Award Criteria: Number of balloons you've shot down with a slingshot

Name: Fun with Fences
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you place a fence

Name: Snowmaestro
Award Criteria: Number of perfect snow-people you've built

Name: Wishes Come True
Award Criteria: Number of shooting stars you've wished on.

Name: Exterior Decorator
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you place some furniture outside

Name: (island name) Icons
Award Criteria: Awarded for changing your town tune and island flag for the first time

Name: Island Designer
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you use the Island Designer app to place a path, add/remove water, and build/destroy a cliff

Name: Wispy Island Secrets
Award Criteria: Number of times you've helped Wisp find the parts of his spirit

Name: Gulliver's Travails
Award Criteria: Number of times you've helped Gulliver fix his communicator

Name: K.K. Mania
Award Criteria: Number of K.K. shows you've attended

Name: True Patron of the Arts
Award Criteria: Number of times you purchased art that turned out to be real

Name: True Friends
Award Criteria: Number of villagers you've become good friends with

Name: Birthday Celebration
Award Criteria: Number of villager birthdays you've attended

Name: Happy Birthday!
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you play on your character's birthday

Name: Fishing Tourney!
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you attend a fishing tourney in each season

Name: Bug-Off!
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you attend a bug-off tourney in each season

Name: Countdown Celebration
Award Criteria: Awarded for attending the new year holiday event

Name: Making a Change
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you use a wardrobe to change your character's outfit

Name: First Custom Design!
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you use the Custom Design app to edit or create a design

Name: Custom Design Pro!
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you use the Custom Design pro app to edit or create a design

Name: Paydirt!
Award Criteria: Awarded the first time you dig up bells from a shining spot

Name: Shady Shakedown
Award Criteria: Number of furniture pieces you've found from shaking trees

Name: Golden Milestone
Award Criteria: Awarded for each unique golden tool you've equipped (shovel, net, fishing rod, watering can, axe, and slingshot)

Name: Island and Yourland
Award Criteria: Number of times you've visited another player's island (does not count mystery islands using Nook Miles Tickets)

Name: Host the Most
Award Criteria: Number of other players that have visited your island

Name: Active Island Resident
Award Criteria: Number of total unique days you've played the game
